name: Strawberry Salad
description: The following recipe is from the June 2 edition of our weekly recipe newsletter. To receive this newsletter in your inbox, sign up here! Over the weekend I found myself with more strawberries than I knew what to do with....
recipeIngredient: 5 ounces mixed salad greens, such as arugula and corn salad, shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Put the strawberries, lettuce, and mixed greens into a salad bowl and mix gently. Whisk together the olive oil and balsamic vinegar in a small bowl and season with salt and pepper. Pour the dressing over the salad, toss gently, and serve.
